task: Concatenate all MF4 files in C:\Users\ADMIN\Downloads\ev-data-pack-v10\ev-data-pack-v10\electric_cars\log_files\Tesla Model 3\LOG\3F78A21D\00000001 folder save the concatenated MF4 file with name Tesla_Model_3_3F78A21D.mf4 in the same folder path

plan.reasoning: Get current desktop state to find running applications and verify if asammdf is available
Activate the asammdf application window so subsequent UI queries and clicks target it
Capture asammdf UI elements (menu bar, Mode menu) and obtain coordinates for the Mode menu
Open the 'Mode' menu to switch to Batch processing (coordinates resolved from previous State-Tool output)
Find the 'Batch processing' menu item coordinates in the opened Mode menu
Select 'Batch processing' mode (coordinates resolved from previous State-Tool output)
Allow the UI to switch to Batch processing mode
Capture the Batch processing view to locate the 'Add files' button
Click 'Add files' to open the file selection dialog (coordinates resolved from previous State-Tool output)
Inspect the Open File dialog to find the address/filename field and the Open button
Focus the filename/address field in the Open dialog so we can enter the target folder and file filter
Enter the full folder path with a wildcard (*.mf4) to select all MF4 files in the specified folder and confirm (press Enter)
Allow the file dialog to resolve the path and list matching files
Locate the 'Open' button in the file dialog (or the dialog control to confirm selection)
Confirm selection of all matching MF4 files and add them to the Batch list
Allow the Batch view to populate with the selected files
Inspect the Batch processing view to find the operation selector/control
Open the operation selector to choose the 'Concatenate' operation
Locate the 'Concatenate' option in the operation list
Select the 'Concatenate' batch operation
Find the output filename / output path input field so we can specify the concatenated file name and location
Focus the output filename field
Enter the full output path and filename so the concatenated MF4 is saved in the same folder with the required name
Locate the 'Start' or 'Save' button to begin the concatenation
Start the batch concatenation process which will create the requested MF4 file
Wait for the concatenation to complete (duration may be adjusted based on file sizes)
Check batch status or confirmation messages to verify that the concatenated file was created successfully

This plan switches asammdf to Batch processing mode, adds all MF4 files from the specified folder, selects the Concatenate operation, sets the full output path and filename to the requested Tesla_Model_3_3F78A21D.mf4 in the same folder, and starts the operation. Repeated State-Tool calls are used to discover UI element coordinates dynamically before each click/type action to avoid hardcoded coordinates and ensure robust interaction.
